name: Prodigal Isekai (Demo)
description:
Plot summary;

Paul and his father have been abducted by a magical tower into the mystical land of Asmodesia!

Separated, it's up to our protagonist to deal with his sudden arrival into a Fantasy world and to find his Dad... Somehow.


NOTE: THIS IS ONLY A DEMO. I worked-out as many bugs as I could find but if you find one, tell me! I'll fix it as soon as I know about it!

I will have this available on GameJolt as well. Use whichever version works for you;

https://gamejolt.com#/games/projectrunawayIsekai/594599
